channel.title: notification on Soichiro Murakami
channel.description: Recent content in notification on Soichiro Murakami

item.title: EACL2021に主著論文が採択されました.
item.description: 論文採択のお知らせ 下記の主著論文がEACL2021に採択されました。 Soichiro Murakami, Sora Tanaka, Masatsugu Hangyo, Hidetaka Kamigaito, Kotaro Funakoshi, Hiroya Takamura and Manabu Okumura, “Generating Weather Comments from Meteorological Simulations”, In Proceedings of the 16th Conference of the European Chapter of the Association for Computational Linguistics (EACL2021)
